name: UBER Possition
description:
Uber Possition is almoust  Brekout like game, where you can't hit any wall because there is no walls! Only a pad for bouncing and few quarks and bozon particles.

In the game there is no loot boxes  and you can loose or win the game, because there is no single one purpose to loose or win in the quantum field theory only uncertainty principle rulez here ;)

HAVE FUN

==========
CONTROLS:
==========

Only Mouse - Move the mouse on x-axis  to change angle
LMB  - to start the game

(i have some problems to implement translation x axis to angle so if any one know how to do it properly let me know how to do it.)

==========

Software Used:

Game Engine - GameMaker 1.4
DAW - Cocos Reaper
2D Graphic - Gimp
3D Graphic - Blender 3D
SFX - Labchirp

P.s.
